item.title: How to decode path parameters in All REST WebServices calls
item.description: How to decode path parameters in All REST WebServices calls TL:DR If there are multiple places requires decode a parameter during WebServices RESTful calls, you can use UrlPathHelper from springframework to do this in central place Image there is one param1 in RESTful URL which may contains some Non URL friendly characters, such as forward slash “/”. You definitely can call URLCodec().decode(param1) on every calls. But that’s cumbersome and error-prone.
